Group the columns by Datum Business Unit Intern Busines Unit Extern Datum Hedgeyear, Sum up the value for Sum and Variance. The Grouped Columns (Business Unit Intern Busines Unit Extern Datum Hedgeyear) should still be shown in the final outcome. Aferwards add a column "comment" in which a comment should be genereated for each line.The comment created contains Profit or Loss depending on if the SUM value is positive or negative, then the sum value and the contributing value which is only variance "{Profit or Loss} {Sum} contributes of Variance {variance}". But if the varience is mor than 50% of the sum ist should say "No commentas vaiance is too high".
